author: Pitch Meeting
description:
Subscribe for more Pitch Meetings: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Kq-yEt1iYsbUzNOoIRK0g

I’m back! And so is Marvel! After a few years of so-so projects and a couple of box office flops, the MCU is back with another team movie in which a bunch of characters fight a character and punch things and jump really high!

Thunderbolts* is the culmination of a phase (probably) and does raise a lot of questions. Like why did Valentina give them all a heads up with a timer in the incinerator? How did Valentina not know that her limo driver was a superhero and the father of one of her operatives? What did Taskmaster fans ever do to Kevin Feige?

To answer all of these questions and more, step inside the pitch meaning that lead to Thunderbolts*

title: Thunderbolts* Pitch Meeting
